Pub Bourbon Street
Pece Matichevski 17, Bitola 7000 Republic of North Macedonia
Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Brunch
Takeout, Outdoor Seating, Seating, Television, Wheelchair Accessible, Serves Alcohol, Full Bar, Free Wifi, Table Service

Typical pub with wide variety of food, including salads, appetizers, pizzas, pasta, barbeque, fondue, falafel , tortillas etc. 40industrial beers and 5 CRAFT beers. Laid back atmosphere with outdoor seating, place you go with friends and forget the usual problems.

Belvedere
Dobrivoje Radosavlevik 3,, Bitola Republic of North Macedonia
Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner
Reservations, Outdoor Seating, Seating, Wheelchair Accessible, Serves Alcohol, Table Service

Belvedere is popular restaurant situated in a very center of Ohrid, 20 meters from lake shore and 50 meters from the harbor. Is distinguished with a unique warm ambiance, detailed with antiques and instruments. You can taste both traditional and international cuisine accompanied with good Macedonian wines and live acoustic music every night in high season.
GT Lounge Bar
Shirok Sokak 55, Bitola 7000 Republic of North Macedonia
Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Brunch, Late Night, Drinks
Reservations, Seating, Table Service

In the strict center of Bitola with the best, carefully prepared and beautifully served food with excellent drinks and wines, a hearty atmosphere and unobtrusive interior makes Lounge Bar GT the right choice for a pleasant lunch or dinner, and of course for breakfast.
